title: THEMIS-D:  Solid State Telescope (SST): Energy Flux spectrogram:  Data includes: Electron/Ion Ground-Calculated Fluxes (30 keV - 300 keV). - V. Angelopoulos, D. Larson & R.P. Lin (UCB, NASA NAS5-02099)

info.contact: V. Angelopoulos, D. Larson & R.P. Lin @ UCB, NASA NAS5-02099

parameters.name: thd_psif_data_quality
parameters.description: SST Full Mode Ion Moment Data Quality (0: Good data, non-zero: Data may not be suitable, see: http://themis.ssl.berkeley.edu/sst_flag.shtml.)

parameters.name: thd_psif_en_efluxQ
parameters.description: SST Ion energy spectrogram(Full Mode) (Good data only). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_esa_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thd_psif_en_eflux', 'thd_psif_data_quality']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: SST Ion energy spectrogram(Full Mode) (Good data only)

parameters.name: thd_psif_densityQ
parameters.description: SST full mode derived ion density(Good data only). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_esa_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thd_psif_density', 'thd_psif_data_quality']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thd_psif_avgtempQ
parameters.description: SST full mode derived average ion temperature(Good data only). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_esa_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thd_psif_avgtemp', 'thd_psif_data_quality']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thd_psif_vthermalQ
parameters.description: SST full mode derived average ion thermal velocity(Good data only). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_esa_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thd_psif_vthermal', 'thd_psif_data_quality']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thd_psif_sc_potQ
parameters.description: Spacecraft potential used in generation of thd_psif moments(Good data only). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_esa_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thd_psif_sc_pot', 'thd_psif_data_quality']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thd_psif_t3Q
parameters.description: SST full mode ion diagonalized temperature (Tprp1, Tprp2, Tpar)(Good data only). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_esa_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thd_psif_t3', 'thd_psif_data_quality']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: Ion Diagonalized Temperature(Tprp1, Tprp2, Tpar)(Good data only)

parameters.name: thd_psif_magt3Q
parameters.description: SST full mode ion temperature temperature magnetic field aligned. (Tprp1FA, Tprp2FA, TparFA)(Good data only). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_esa_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thd_psif_magt3', 'thd_psif_data_quality']. parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: Ion Temperature, Field Aligned(Tprp1FA, Tprp2FA, TparFA)(Good data only)
